title: [Question]DDCO THIRD SEM PREP
content: Can anyone please tell what to actually study in text book (like what's important and not to skip)

comments.body:
I didn't study text book at all , but I don't recommend this . Cause to solve isa and esa questions you need to understand the topics thoroughly.If you understand everything that's taught in class , u will be good to go.
You can study topic wise in textbook , all the sections which are needed will be mentioned in your syllabus plan.

The textbook prescribed for the first 2 units has very good exercise problems at the end of the chapter. These exact problems will most likely appear in your isa/esa. Some guy on YouTube(god bless him) has solved every problem in this textbook in ample detail. Do those and you will be good to go.
hey do you know his yt channel's name? would be helpful
I don't remember the name. You'll get it pretty easy just copy paste one of the questions.
